item.title: Stocks Pare Losses From Nvidia, Meituan Declines: Markets Wrap
item.description: Asian technology stocks pared losses after Nvidia Corp.’s earnings as Chinese chip shares rallied following a report that said companies aim to triple the output of artificial intelligence processors

item.title: Stocks Pare Losses From Nvidia, Meituan Declines: Markets Wrap
item.description: Asian technology stocks pared losses after Nvidia Corp.’s earnings as Chinese chip shares rallied following a report that said companies aim to triple the output of artificial intelligence processors

item.title: Meituan Jumps With Food Deliverers as Beijing Targets Price Wars
item.description: Meituan led gains in China’s food-delivery shares after the authorities sought to damp down rampant price competition in the sector.
